thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 85 of 1961
thread.title: Tim H.

author: Tim H.
title: Tim H.
text: After being slightly nervous about booking online with a company I had not used before, this turned out to be a very good experience. Easy purchase, good follow up call and a very pleasant engineer who turned up on time and seemed to know his stuff. If everything turned out to be as easy and as pleasant as this then life would be a lot easier! Highly recommended. Obviously if the wheel falls off on my first drive, I will post a follow up, but somehow I doubt it!
